question: The scheme which is launched in Jharkhand to provide houses to freedom fighters is?
explanation: Jharkhand Government in the presence of BJP Leader Amit Shah launched Shaheed Gram Vikas Yojana aimed at developing villages of freedom fighters in the state. Under this scheme, villages of many tribal freedom fighters will be developed and their habitats will be provided basic amenities and these villages will be provided basic amenities. These villages remained inaccessible for a long time after Independence because of Left-wing extremism.
